Content: The tourism industry which underwent a setback due to Easter Sunday Terrorist attacks is gradually returning to normalcy.The Government was able to earn a high income through the tourism industry during the past few years by the county becoming the best touristâ€™s destination. Therefore the government has implemented an extensive program to uplift the tourism industry and to attract tourists. The government has already provided immediate relief to those who are engaged in the tourism industry. Foreign tourists who have arrived in the country say that there is no reason to fear to visit Sri Lanka as the security situation in the country has been restored.
